alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued September 23 at 7:35PM EDT until September 24 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the middle 30s with light winds will result in frost formation, especially in sheltered valleys. * WHERE...In New York, Northern Oneida, Steuben, Chemung, Otsego, Tioga, Delaware and Sullivan counties. In Pennsylvania, Bradford county. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coldest temperatures and highest risk of frost is expected in sheltered valley locations.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
